thread.title: Trump's focus on MS-13 deepens impasse over immigration

title: Trump's focus on MS-13 deepens impasse over immigration
text:
Trump's focus on MS-13 deepens impasse over immigration 5:37am EST - 02:33 
President Donald Trump's use of MS-13 to frame his argument for tougher immigration rules is igniting a backlash from Democrats with whom he needs to strike a deal to avert another federal shutdown on February 8th. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Donald Trump's use of MS-13 to frame his argument for tougher immigration rules is igniting a backlash from Democrats with whom he needs to strike a deal to avert another federal shutdown on February 8th.
